metadata.title: CVE-2022-25299 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: This affects the package cesanta/mongoose before 7.6. The unsafe handlingof file names during upload using mg_http_upload() method may enableattackers to write files to arbitrary locations outside the designatedtarget folder.

criterions.comment: phantomjs package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
